Class LoyaltyCardArrayClass

  • java.lang.Object
    • LoyaltyCardArrayClass

  • public class LoyaltyCardArrayClass
extends java.lang.Object
    This class utilises a simple array to hold Loyalty Cards and enables the user to modify and search through the list.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Nathan Edmond / w14025063

        This will search the array and return the index for a given card number
        Parameters:

        Returns:
